data.text: Maawɔin nui ná-GALA falii, siɛgi zu suvikɛi ɓegai la, é ɗa ná-kpalai lɛ ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI.
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, woilo nà-maanɛɛnɛ wooi ma,
Mina ɠaazulɔɔɠu bà, nà-kidaaʋili foloi!
Mazɔlɔɔ nà-eteai ɠa ɲɛɛlɛzu eɠɛ duului,
Kɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ tufai teʋeai ga, é la foloi ɠa,
Gè yɛga kpalagi wosu,
Gè ɠɛa eɠɛ teʋebai zu ɠoɠɛi,
Nà ɠaazuɓaazu,
Foloi pɛ daawu, sìli nuiti ta ɓaaɠulazu mà,
Zuʋui ɠa é ga dàamianigi, ɓului ʋotogi zu.
ɗa-yiimaleʋei maaʋele ma, ta ɗa-yiiɠulagi,
Sìi ma voloiti maa ɠa yeizu eɠɛ kpɔkɔmaʋɛ niinigi,
Kɛlɛ ɗɔun ɗa, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗa masadai ɠɛɛzu eyɛsu ɠɔ,
Ɗa wuzeɠe, è Siyɔn maawɔinɠa,
Mazɔlɔɔ gɛi gi ga ɗa-wotiɠɛ nuiti, ná-kɔtuiti nɛɛʋɛ gi ʋɛ,
Zii ɠiligiti ta Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI lɛbi,
siɛgi zu Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI Siyɔn losu da ʋolu,
Niiti ti maawɔinɗai, é la naati ta-maanɛɛnɛ wooi ʋɛlɛʋiliga,
Naama vaiti ti zɛʋɛ, é makɛ yeeɠɛɠalai ma nuiti tuɠɔ ti ʋaazu,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI yɛni zeini seizu ɲadegai ungaʋɛ, é wɛlɛ buu ʋelei,
é kasoɠa nuiti kpala gooiti mɛnini,
naa ɠa a kɛ, nuiti ti Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maawoo ziɛ Siyɔn,
siɛgi zu nuɓusɛiti ti ɠaalɛɛzu ba la náʋɛ,
É sɛ̀bɛi zuɠoloɠologa pele zu,
Naa ɠa é ba, gè kpeei loozu la, gè ɠɛ ma:
Kaite è eteai lɔɔɓadɔni,
Ta ɲɛɛlɛ, kɛlɛ ɗɔun ɗa ná eyɛsu ɠɔ.
Kɛlɛ ɗɔun, ɗa yɛsu ɠɛʋele ma,
Ɗa-wotiɠɛ nuiti ti-lointi ta zeizu zɔlɔɔ,
